Present location: INSTITUT DE PAPYROLOGIE ET D'ÉGYPTOLOGIE, UNIVERSITÉ DE LILLE III [02/049] LILLE
Name: Vase
Description: Vase with a biconical profile and narrow orifice, belonging to the category of so-called black and red wares, which means that its interior surface and outer rim are black, whereas the rest of the exterior surface is red.  The surface treatment on the exterior created a rippled effect (hence "rippled ware").
